name: Full on crisp google inbox
description:
All this theme does is to change the fonts in google inbox to a more readable "crisp" font.
I'd prefer the entire web that way but that might be just me =) Hope you like it.

user.name: David Campbell
user.about:
I try to follow through with great things that come to mind. I intentionally own my life and my circumstances and I love to be alive.
My most amazing feat is getting to know my wife.
